smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function onCreate is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onViewCreated is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onViewCreated is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onViewCreated is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class MainActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function onCreate is nested too deeply.
Function updateView is nested too deeply.
Function load is nested too deeply.
Function update is nested too deeply.
Function update is nested too deeply.
Function doInBackground is nested too deeply.
Function createTree is nested too deeply.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'MainActivity' with '17' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'Rpc' with '24' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'BaseTorrentFilesAdapter' with '15' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'TorrentFilesFragment' with '19' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'TorrentPropertiesActivity' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function createTextFieldDialog has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.
The function showTorrentNotification has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: EmptyCatchBlock
smells.description: Empty block of code detected. As they serve no purpose they should be removed.

instances.message: This empty block of code can be removed.

smells.name: FunctionMaxLength
smells.description: Function names should not be longer than the maximum set in the project configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: FunctionParameterNaming
smells.description: Function parameter names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Function parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: MemberNameEqualsClassName
smells.description: A member should not given the same name as its parent class or object.

instances.message: A member is named after the class object. This might result in confusion. Please rename the member.

smells.name: LateinitUsage

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (torrent.status == Torrent.Status.Downloading) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: torrent.status == Torrent.Status.Downloading
Parentheses in (torrent.status == Torrent.Status.Seeding) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: torrent.status == Torrent.Status.Seeding
Parentheses in (torrent.status == Torrent.Status.Paused) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: torrent.status == Torrent.Status.Paused
Parentheses in (torrent.status == Torrent.Status.Checking) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: torrent.status == Torrent.Status.Checking
Parentheses in (torrent.status == Torrent.Status.Checking) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: torrent.status == Torrent.Status.Checking
Parentheses in (torrent.status == Torrent.Status.Errored) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: torrent.status == Torrent.Status.Errored
Parentheses in (torrent.trackers.find { it == trackerFilter } != null) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: torrent.trackers.find { it == trackerFilter } != null

Parentheses in (torrentFileParser.status == TorrentFileParser.Status.Loaded && Rpc.instance.isConnected) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: torrentFileParser.status == TorrentFileParser.Status.Loaded && Rpc.instance.isConnected

Parentheses in (Rpc.instance.status() == BaseRpc.Status.Connecting && torrentFileParser.status == TorrentFileParser.Status.Loaded) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: Rpc.instance.status() == BaseRpc.Status.Connecting && torrentFileParser.status == TorrentFileParser.Status.Loaded
Parentheses in (torrent.isFinished) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: torrent.isFinished
Parentheses in (server === Servers.currentServer) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: server === Servers.currentServer
Parentheses in (value != State.Unchecked) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: value != State.Unchecked
Parentheses in (currentDirectory !== rootDirectory) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: currentDirectory !== rootDirectory
Parentheses in (selector.actionMode == null) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: selector.actionMode == null
Parentheses in (position == 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: position == 0
Parentheses in (first.wantedState == Item.WantedState.Wanted) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: first.wantedState == Item.WantedState.Wanted
Parentheses in (first.priority == Item.Priority.Mixed) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: first.priority == Item.Priority.Mixed
Parentheses in (completedSize.toFloat() / bytes.toFloat()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: completedSize.toFloat() / bytes.toFloat()
Parentheses in (hourOfDay * 60) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: hourOfDay * 60
Parentheses in (hourOfDay * 60) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: hourOfDay * 60
Parentheses in (server == currentServerField) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: server == currentServerField
Parentheses in (newServer.name == currentServerField!!.name) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: newServer.name == currentServerField!!.name
Parentheses in (position == 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: position == 2
Parentheses in (position == 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: position == 2
Parentheses in (selector.selectedCount == 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: selector.selectedCount == 1
Parentheses in (active || creating) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: active || creating
Parentheses in (torrent != null) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: torrent != null
Parentheses in (currentDirectory.parentFile != null) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: currentDirectory.parentFile != null
